void AK::MemoryMgr::StartProfileThreadUsage ( AkMemPoolId  in_PoolId  ) 

Called to start profiling memory usage for one thread (the calling thread).

Note:
Not implementing this will result in the Soundbank tab of the Wwise Profiler to show 0 bytes for memory usage.
Parameters:
in_PoolId Pool to profile
